description: This file defines a Todo application using the jsblocks framework, including models, collections, and views for managing todos with local storage persistence.

classes.name: Todo
classes.description: Model representing a single todo item with properties and methods for editing, toggling completion, and handling actions.

classes.name: Todos
classes.description: Collection managing multiple Todo models, including methods for loading, saving, toggling all, and clearing completed todos.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes Todo and Todos models, sets up event handlers, and loads data from local storage.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles the completed state of a Todo.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Enters editing mode for a Todo.

methods.name: closeEdit
methods.description: Exits editing mode, destroys the Todo if the title is empty.

methods.name: handleAction
methods.description: Handles key events for editing a Todo, specifically Enter and Escape keys.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Sets all todos as completed or active based on current remaining count.

methods.name: clearCompleted
methods.description: Removes all completed todos from the collection.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves all todos to local storage.

methods.name: updateRemaining
methods.description: Updates the observable count of remaining incomplete todos.

methods.name: routed
methods.description: Handles route changes to filter todos by status.

methods.name: addTodo
methods.description: Adds a new todo to the collection if the Enter key is pressed and the title is not empty.
